notes.text:
The ppp package was updated to fix the following security issue:

- CVE-2015-3310: Fixed a buffer overflow in radius plug-in's rc_mksid() (bsc#927841).
notes.title: Description of the patch

relationships.relates_to_product_reference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 11 SP4

notes.text: Buffer overflow in the rc_mksid function in plugins/radius/util.c in Paul's PPP Package (ppp) 2.4.6 and earlier, when the PID for pppd is greater than 65535, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a start accounting message to the RADIUS server.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
